caption:
The photograph depicts an outdoor scene featuring a large sign for "The Crystal Tower," which advertises "Exclusive Luxury Condominiums for the Discriminate Buyer." The sign details amenities such as a recreation room, swimming pool, and private beach, and mentions that 2-3 bedroom homes are for sale. A phone number and an apartment number for inquiries are also provided on the sign.

To the left of the sign, partially visible, is a white car with its door open. A woman is standing next to the car, dressed in a red vest over a white shirt, with dark sunglasses and her hair styled under a hat. She appears to be either entering or exiting the vehicle, looking slightly towards her right at something outside the frame of the photograph.

The sign and the woman are against a background consisting of a stone-built structure, possibly part of the condominium building advertised. The photograph is taken under bright sunlight with distinct shadows cast across the sign, likely from a nearby structure or natural element out of frame. The overall composition gives a sense of a promotional or real estate-related activity, capturing a moment in a sunny, residential parking area.
title: Condominium boom.  (from the documerica-1 exhibition.  For other images in this assignment, see fiche numbers 18, 19, 37, 38, 58.)
